00019 ## \brief Framework for particle filter runs
00020 class ParticleFilterFramework(FrameworkBase):
00021   ## \brief Constructor
00022   def __init__(self, userModel):
00023     frameworkBase.FrameworkBase.__init__(self)
00024     self._d_model = userModel
00025     self._testRequirements()
00026     self._d_totalTimesteps = self._userModel().nrTimeSteps()
00027     self._d_trackCloned = {}
00028 
00029     self._resetSampleWeights()
00030 
00031     self._addMethodToClass(self._setParticleWeight)
00032     self._addMethodToClass(self._runPremcloop)
00033     self._addMethodToClass(self._runPostmcloop)

00046   def _testRequirements(self):
00047     if hasattr(self._userModel(), "_userModel"):
00048       msg = "The _userModel method is deprecated and obsolete"
00049       self.showWarning(msg)
00050     #\todo test to dynamic framework model
00051     if not isinstance(self._userFramework(), mcFramework.MonteCarloFramework):
00052       msg = "Model must be instance of MonteCarloFramework"
00053       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00054 
00055     if not hasattr(self._d_model, 'run'):
00056       msg = "No 'run' section defined."
00057       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00058 
00059     if not hasattr(self._userModel(), 'updateWeight'):
00060       msg = "Cannot run particle filter framework: Implement 'updateWeight' method"
00061       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00062 
00063     if not hasattr(self._userModel(), 'suspend'):
00064       msg = "Cannot run particle filter framework: Implement 'suspend' method"
00065       raise FrameworkError(msg)
00066 
00067     if not hasattr(self._userModel(), 'resume'):
00068       msg = "Cannot run particle filter framework: Implement 'resume' method"
00069       raise FrameworkError(msg)

00077   ## \brief Creates the subdirectories for state variables
00078   # \todo test if mc dirs are there...
00079   def _initialiseSampleDirectories(self):
00080     sample = self._userModel()._firstSampleNumber()
00081     while sample <= self._userModel()._lastSampleNumber():
00082       cwd = os.getcwd()
00083 
00084       dirname = "%d" % (sample)
00085       varName = "stateVar"
00086       os.chdir(dirname)
00087 
00088       if not os.path.isdir(varName):
00089         # Create sample directory.
00090         os.mkdir(varName)
00091       else :
00092         #if not os.path.isdir(varName):
00093         #  # Remove existing file with name of sample directory.
00094         os.remove(varName)
00095         os.mkdir(varName)
00096 
00097       os.chdir(cwd)
00098       assert os.path.exists(os.path.join(dirname,"stateVar")) and os.path.isdir(os.path.join(dirname,"stateVar"))
00099       sample += 1

00101   ## \brief Setting the filter moments
00102   def setFilterTimesteps(self, filterTimesteps):
00103     assert type(filterTimesteps) == list or type(filterTimesteps) == numpy.ndarray
00104     # \todo assert some more
00105     for filtertimestep in filterTimesteps:
00106       assert filtertimestep <= self._userModel().nrTimeSteps()
00107       assert filtertimestep > 0
00108 
00109     self._userModel()._d_filterTimesteps = filterTimesteps

00111   ## \brief Returns a list of filter moments
00112   def filterTimesteps(self):

00115   ## \brief Re-implemented from ShellScript.
00116   #
00117   # Runs the user model in the filter mode.
00118   def run(self):
00119     if(hasattr(self._userModel(), 'run')):
00120       self._userModel().run()
00121     else:
00122       self._atStartOfScript()
00123       self._initialiseSampleDirectories()
00124 
00125       lastPeriod = len(self._userModel()._d_filterTimesteps)
00126 
00127       if lastPeriod == 0:
00128         self.showError("No filter timesteps specified")
00129         sys.exit()
00130 
00131 
00132 
00133       # set the proposal/initial weight distribution by user
00134       if hasattr(self._userModel(), 'setInitialParticleWeights'):
00135         self._userModel()._d_particleWeights = self._userModel().setInitialParticleWeights()
00136 
00137         # check initial weights
00138         assert type(self._particleWeights()) == list
00139         assert len(self._particleWeights()) == self._userModel().nrSamples()
00140 
00141         for i in range(0, len(self._particleWeights())):
00142           assert type(self._particleWeights()[i]) == float
00143 
00144       # run the premc loop
00145       self._userModel()._runPremcloop()
00146 
00147       # looping over the filter periods
00148       for currentPeriod in range(0, len(self._userModel()._d_filterTimesteps) + 1):
00149 
00150         # \todo replace with a better solution...
00151         sumW = sum(self._particleWeights())
00152         assert abs(sumW - 1.0) < 0.00001
00153 
00154         # here we never execute premc and postmc
00155         self._runMonteCarlo(currentPeriod, lastPeriod)
00156 
00157 
00158 
00159 
00160         if not currentPeriod == lastPeriod:
00161           # update the weights
00162           # calling the "objective fuction" for each sample
00163           for sample in range(1, self._userModel().nrSamples() + 1):
00164             self._userModel()._setCurrentSample(sample)
00165             self._userModel()._d_inUpdateWeight = True
00166             fitnessValue = self._userModel().updateWeight()
00167             self._userModel()._d_inUpdateWeight = False
00168             assert type(fitnessValue) == float or type(fitnessValue) == int
00169             self._userModel()._d_particleWeights[sample - 1] = fitnessValue
00170 
00171 
00172           # determine samples to clone
00173           samplesToClone = self._samplesToClone(self._particleWeights())
00174           assert sum(samplesToClone) == self._userModel().nrSamples()
00175 
00176 
00177           # clone the data
00178           self._cloneData(samplesToClone)
00179 
00180 
00181           # reset the sample weights
00182           self._resetSampleWeights()
00183 
00184           currentPeriod += 1
00185           self._userModel()._d_filterPeriod += 1
00186 
00187     # run the postmc loop
00188     self._userModel()._setFirstTimeStep(self._userModel().firstTimeStep()) #1)
00189     self._userModel()._runPostmcloop()
00190     self._createGraph()
00191     return 0
00192

00195   def _createGraph(self):
00196     oFile = open("samples.dot","w")
00197     oFile.write("digraph G {\n")
00198     oFile.write("nodesep=.002;\n")
00199     oFile.write("ranksep=1.00;\n")
00200     oFile.write("rankdir=LR;\n")
00201     oFile.write("node [shape=plaintext];\n")
00202     for i in range(0, len(self._userModel()._d_filterTimesteps) + 1):
00203       oFile.write("{range=same;")
00204       for j in range(1, self._userModel().nrSamples() + 1):
00205         oFile.write("\"%d-%d\";" % (i, j))
00206       oFile.write("}\n")
00207 
00208     for key in self._d_trackCloned.keys():
00209       if self._d_trackCloned[key] == 0:
00210         #oFile.write("\"%s\";\n" % (key))
00211         pass
00212       elif not type(self._d_trackCloned[key]) == list:
00213         oFile.write("\"%s\" -> \"%s\";\n" % (key, self._d_trackCloned[key]))
00214       else:
00215         for i in self._d_trackCloned[key]:
00216           oFile.write("\"%s\" -> \"%s\";\n" % (key, i)) #self._d_trackCloned[key]))
00217     oFile.write("}")
00218     oFile.close()

00220   def _cloneData(self, samplesToClone):
00221     # determine 'dead' samples
00222     notClonedSamples = []
00223     for i in range(1, len(samplesToClone) + 1):
00224       if samplesToClone[i - 1] == 0:
00225         notClonedSamples.append(i)
00226         # record the samples which are deleted
00227         el1 = str(self._userModel()._d_filterPeriod) + "-"+ str(i)
00228         el2 = 0
00229         self._d_trackCloned[el1] = el2
00230       elif samplesToClone[i - 1] == 1:
00231         # record the samples which are continued, but not cloned
00232         el1 = str(self._userModel()._d_filterPeriod) + "-"+ str(i)
00233         el2 = str(self._userModel()._d_filterPeriod + 1) + "-"+ str(i)
00234         self._d_trackCloned[el1] = el2
00235 
00236     # rm state in 'dead' samples
00237     for i in range(0, len(notClonedSamples)):
00238       dirName = os.path.join("%d" % notClonedSamples[i], "stateVar")
00239       shutil.rmtree(dirName)
00240 
00241 
00242 
00243 
00244     clonedSamples = []
00245     for i in range(1, len(samplesToClone) + 1):
00246       if samplesToClone[i - 1] > 1:
00247         clonedSamples.append(i)
00248 
00249     # each cloned sample
00250     for i in range(0, len(clonedSamples)):
00251 
00252 
00253       # record which sample is cloned
00254       clonedFrom = str(self._userModel()._d_filterPeriod) + "-"+ str(clonedSamples[i])
00255       clonedTo = []
00256       # how often current sample cloned? Do not clone yourself
00257       for j in range(1, int(samplesToClone[clonedSamples[i] - 1])):
00258         # \todo dir or subdir
00259         source = os.path.join(str(clonedSamples[i]), "stateVar")
00260 
00261         sample = str(notClonedSamples.pop())
00262         dest = os.path.join(sample, "stateVar")
00263         shutil.copytree(source, dest)
00264 
00265         if j == 1:
00266           # record the cloned sample as 'continuing itself'
00267           clonedTo.append(str(self._userModel()._d_filterPeriod + 1) + "-" + str(clonedSamples[i]))
00268           # record the clone
00269           clonedTo.append(str(self._userModel()._d_filterPeriod + 1) + "-"+ sample)
00270         else:
00271           # record the clone
00272           clonedTo.append(str(self._userModel()._d_filterPeriod + 1) + "-"+ sample)
00273       self._d_trackCloned[clonedFrom] = clonedTo
00274

00276   def _normaliseWeights(self, weights):
00277     assert weights
00278     sumWeights = sum(weights)
00279     if sumWeights == 0:
00280       norm = [1.0 / self._userModel().nrSamples()] * self._userModel().nrSamples()
00281     else:
00282       norm = [0.0] * len(weights)
00283       for i in range(0, len(weights)):
00284         norm[i] =  weights[i] / sumWeights
00285 
00286     return norm
00287 
00288 
00289   def _resetSampleWeights(self):
00290     assert self._userModel().nrSamples() > 0
00291     self._userModel()._d_particleWeights = [1.0 / self._userModel().nrSamples()] * self._userModel().nrSamples()
00292 
00293 
00294   def _cumulativeWeights(self, weights):
00295     cumulative = [0.0] * self._userModel().nrSamples()
00296     value = 0.0
00297     for i in range(len(weights)):
00298       value += weights[i]
00299       cumulative[i] = value
00300     return cumulative
00301

00304   def _startEndOfPeriod(self, currentPeriod, lastPeriod):
00305     # determine start end end timestep of current period
00306     if currentPeriod == 0:
00307       startTimestep = 1
00308       endTimestep = self._userModel()._d_filterTimesteps[currentPeriod]
00309     elif currentPeriod == lastPeriod:
00310       startTimestep = self._userModel()._d_filterTimesteps[currentPeriod -1] + 1
00311       endTimestep = self._d_totalTimesteps
00312     else:
00313       startTimestep = self._userModel()._d_filterTimesteps[currentPeriod - 1] + 1
00314       endTimestep = self._userModel()._d_filterTimesteps[currentPeriod]
00315 
00316     assert startTimestep <= endTimestep
00317     return startTimestep, endTimestep
00318 
00319 
00320   def _executePrePostMc(self, currentPeriod, lastPeriod):
00321     if currentPeriod == 0:
00322       # execute premc
00323       premc = True
00324       postmc = False
00325     elif currentPeriod == lastPeriod:
00326       # execute postmc
00327       premc = False
00328       postmc = True
00329     else:
00330       # without pre/postmc
00331       premc = False
00332       postmc = False
00333     # \todo assert something
00334     return premc, postmc
00335 
00336   def _runMonteCarlo(self, currentPeriod, lastPeriod):
00337     #  get user model and (re)set start and end time
00338     startTimestep, endTimestep = self._startEndOfPeriod(currentPeriod, lastPeriod)
00339 
00340     self._userModel()._setNrTimeSteps(endTimestep)
00341     self._userModel()._setFirstTimeStep(startTimestep)
00342     # \todo test this one, why is this endTimestep?!
00343     # otherwise timestep == 0 in updateWeight?!
00344     self._userModel()._setCurrentTimeStep(endTimestep)
00345 
00346     # determine MC execution with(out) pre/postloop
00347     #premc, postmc = self._executePrePostMc(currentPeriod, lastPeriod)
00348 
00349     # run the model in mc mode for current filter period
00350     self._incrementIndentLevel()
00351     self._atStartOfFilterPeriod(currentPeriod)
00352     self._d_model.run(False, False)
00353     self._atEndOfFilterPeriod()
00354     self._decrementIndentLevel()

00362   ## \brief Returns the weight of a particle
00363   def particleWeight(self, sample):
00364     assert self._d_particleWeights
00365     assert sample >= self._firstSampleNumber()
00366     assert sample <= self._lastSampleNumber()
00367     return self._d_particleWeights[sample - 1]
00368 
00369   def _setParticleWeight(self, sample, weight):
00370     assert self._d_particleWeights
00371     assert sample >= self._firstSampleNumber()
00372     assert sample <= self._lastSampleNumber()
00373     self._d_particleWeights[sample - 1] = weight

00383   ## \brief reading deterministic data from disk
00384   # returns the map of the current time step from the current working directory
00385   def readDeterministic(self, name):
00386     if self._userModel()._inPremc() or self._inPostmc() or self._inInitial():
00387       newName = name + ".map"
00388     else:
00389       newName = generateNameT(name, self._userModel().currentTimeStep())
00390     import PCRaster
00391     return PCRaster.readmap(newName)

00397 ## \brief Sequential importance resampling algorithm
00398 class SequentialImportanceResamplingFramework(ParticleFilterFramework):
00399   ## \brief Constructor
00400   def __init__(self, userModel):
00401     ParticleFilterFramework.__init__(self, userModel)
00402     self._addMethodToClass(self.optimalSampleNumber)
00403 
00404 
00405   def _samplesToClone(self, weights):
00406     # normalise weights
00407     normalisedWeights = self._normaliseWeights(self._particleWeights())
00408 
00409     cumulativeWeights = self._cumulativeWeights(normalisedWeights)
00410 
00411     samplesToClone = [0] * self._userModel().nrSamples()
00412     for i in range(0, self._userModel().nrSamples()):
00413       lower = 0.0
00414       uniformReal = random.uniform(0.0, 1.0)
00415       for j in range(0, len(cumulativeWeights)):
00416         upper = cumulativeWeights[j]
00417         if uniformReal > lower and uniformReal <= upper:
00418           samplesToClone[j] += 1
00419         lower = upper
00420 
00421     self._writeFilterStatistics(normalisedWeights, cumulativeWeights, samplesToClone)
00422     return samplesToClone
00423 
00424 
00425   def optimalSampleNumber(self, filterTimestep):
00426     filename = "filter%s.csv" % (filterTimestep)
00427 
00428     handle = open(filename, 'r')
00429     col = numpy.zeros(self._userModel().nrSamples())
00430     row = 0
00431     for line in handle.xreadlines():
00432       col1, col2, col3, col4 = line.split(';')
00433       if row > 0:
00434         col[row - 1] = float(col2)
00435       row += 1
00436 
00437     return ((numpy.nonzero(col == max(col))[0])[0]) + 1
00438 
00439 
00440 
00441   def _writeFilterStatistics(self, normalisedWeights, cumulativeWeights, samplesToClone):
00442     filename = "filterSIR_%s.csv" % (self._userModel().currentTimeStep())
00443     csvFile = csv.writer(open(filename, "w"), delimiter=";",quoting=csv.QUOTE_NONNUMERIC)
00444 
00445     csvFile.writerow(["sample", "normalised weight", "cumulative weight", "resampled particles"])
00446     for i in range(0, self._userModel().nrSamples()):
00447       csvFile.writerow([(i+1), normalisedWeights[i], cumulativeWeights[i], samplesToClone[i]])

00456 ## \brief Residual resampling algorithm
00457 class ResidualResamplingFramework(ParticleFilterFramework):
00458   ## \brief Constructor
00459   def __init__(self, userModel):
00460     ParticleFilterFramework.__init__(self, userModel)
00461 
00462 
00463   def _samplesToClone(self, sampleWeights):
00464     # normalise weights
00465     weights = self._normaliseWeights(sampleWeights)
00466 
00467     nrSamples = self._userModel().nrSamples()
00468     samplesToClone = [int(0)] * nrSamples
00469     cdfResidualWeights = numpy.zeros(nrSamples)
00470 
00471     # resampling factor
00472     for i in range(0, self._userModel().nrSamples()):
00473       samplesToClone[i] = int(math.floor(nrSamples * weights[i]))
00474     # bookkeeping for reporting statistics
00475     resamplingFactor = samplesToClone[:]
00476 
00477     # obtain residual number of samples to clone
00478     nrNewSamples = sum(samplesToClone)
00479     if nrNewSamples < nrSamples:
00480       nrMissingSamples = int(nrSamples - nrNewSamples)
00481       residualWeights = [0.0] * nrSamples
00482 
00483       for i in range(0, len(residualWeights)):
00484         residualWeights[i] = (nrSamples * weights[i] - math.floor(nrSamples * weights[i])) / nrMissingSamples
00485 
00486       #\todo replace this
00487       normalisedResidualWeights = [0.0] * nrSamples
00488       sumWeights = sum(residualWeights)
00489       for i in range(0, len(residualWeights)):
00490         normalisedResidualWeights[i] = residualWeights[i] / sumWeights
00491 
00492       assert normalisedResidualWeights
00493       cdfResidualWeights = self._cumulativeWeights(normalisedResidualWeights)
00494 
00495       for i in range(0, nrMissingSamples):
00496         lower = 0.0
00497         uniformReal = random.uniform(0.0, 1.0)
00498         for j in range(0, len(cdfResidualWeights)):
00499           upper = cdfResidualWeights[j]
00500           if uniformReal > lower and uniformReal <= upper:
00501             samplesToClone[j] += 1
00502           lower = upper
00503 
00504     assert sum(samplesToClone) == nrSamples
00505     self._writeFilterStatistics(weights, resamplingFactor, cdfResidualWeights, samplesToClone)
00506     return samplesToClone
00507 
00508 
00509   def _writeFilterStatistics(self, normalisedWeights, resamplingFactor, cdfResidualWeights, samplesToClone):
00510     filename = "filterRR_%s.csv" % (self._userModel().currentTimeStep())
00511     csvFile = csv.writer(open(filename, "w"), delimiter=";",quoting=csv.QUOTE_NONNUMERIC)
00512 
00513     csvFile.writerow(["sample", "normalised weight", "resampling factor", "cdf residual weights", "resampled particles"])
00514     for i in range(0, self._userModel().nrSamples()):
00515       csvFile.writerow([(i+1), normalisedWeights[i], resamplingFactor[i], cdfResidualWeights[i], samplesToClone[i]])
